pages.text: $(bred)Bobsle Zombie$() appears at the same time as Bobsle Car.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will gain $(l)Regeneration and Speed$() Effect when moving on $(baqua)snow or ice$().$(bred)it won't be cold or frozen or butter$().
